p.k: Russian soprano Dilyara Idrisova (1988) performs 'I'm sad, dear father!' from Mikhail Glinka's opera Ruslan und Ludmilla, 'Zerfließe, mein Herze' from J. S. Bach's St. John Passion (BWV 245), and 'Al destin, che la minaccia' from W. A. Mozart's opera Mitridate, Re di Ponto.
p.d: Russian soprano Dilyara Idrisova (1988) performs 'I'm sad, dear father!' from Mikhail Glinka's opera Ruslan und Ludmilla, 'Zerfließe, mein Herze' from J. S. Bach's St. John Passion (BWV 245), and 'Al destin, che la minaccia' from W. A. Mozart's opera Mitridate, Re di Ponto, during the semi-finals of the Concours musical international de Montréal, 2018.
